attributes.action: Make NHS staff tax exemp for hours worked over contracted hours during covid
attributes.additional_details: NHS staff need to feel valued when they are putting themselves and their families at risk for the benefit of others. While other workers are allowed to self iscolate and work from home, nhs cant and therefore their wages should reflect this.
attributes.background: I believe that during the coronavirus period, when the NHS is stretched and staff are working extra shifts/longer hours to help, the money for these extra shifts over their contracts hours should be tax free.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/304595

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
